text: On an application, there is a big form (200 lines). So it is 200 hundred times these lines in a html table : 1. I get this exception on any indexes. I just entered 4 lines and i get this erron on index 108. It is like all the fields are not sent. text:
The error is in your code, not ours.

The tomcat version you're using is not in active development, so filing bugs 
against it is useless.

Hence, I'm closing this.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
